title: Diamond Vine Necklace - Vaira Haram
features: Delicate vine design with individually set brilliant cut diamonds. The setting maximizes light reflection for exceptional sparkle. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear. Features a secure lobster clasp.
colors: Rose gold with sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: and special evening events. Also suitable as a stylish day-to-night piece.
description: A modern twist on the traditional Haram, this diamond vine necklace offers sophisticated elegance with exceptional brilliance. The delicate design is both eye-catching and versatile, making it a timeless addition to any jewelry collection. Handcrafted with precision and attention to detail using high-quality materials, ensuring lasting beauty and value.
